content.raw:
I added a small bit of refactoring in [branch line_scpeters](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign_math/commits/branch/line_scpeters):

* Colinear -> Collinear dc108a8
* small test modifications 10dc96a
* added a few extra degenerate line (zero length) test cases 49548f7

As of 49548f7, the test is failing. I think I set up the expectations properly for a consistent API, but that should be checked before trying to fix it.
content.html:
I added a small bit of refactoring in branch line_scpeters:

  • Colinear -> Collinear dc108a8
  • small test modifications 10dc96a
  • added a few extra degenerate line (zero length) test cases 49548f7

As of 49548f7, the test is failing. I think I set up the expectations properly for a consistent API, but that should be checked before trying to fix it.
